attributes.action: Make it illegal for dogs to be out in public without wearing a muzzle.
attributes.additional_details: So that people can feel safe when dogs are around
attributes.background: Make it illegal to walk a dog in public without it wearing a muzzle, which wouldn’t discriminate against certain breeds

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Make all dogs no matter what breed muzzled in public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633198
